item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Scott, and I like drawing shapes, drinking good beer, and climbing mountains. I wanted a place to talk about things that interest me. The topics include: smart stuff, things that the person building this site does not understand interesting articles that I would like to share and/or save for future reference things that I find inspiring maybe you will too - Good Music! So, there you have it… enjoy!
